entry.title: ego and action
entry.summary: Our Ego fights action with smart questions and doubts, and if you engage in those, you fell into the trap, it’s an endless cycle from others — more questions, doubts — right and wrong, and no progress.

entry.title: overthinking
entry.summary: Overthinking is a learned behaviour from childhood that once made us feel safe, we learnt only if we computed all combinations, and considered all possibilities, we'll then find a solution to be safe – the problem is, most of us still carry this wounded part with us today, which drains our energy because things look bigger than they are, and everything feels overwhelming, so we either quit before we start or lose motivation.

entry.title: rick rubin on procastination
entry.summary: i stumbled upon this video of rick rubin where he speaks about creative/writer block and it deeply resonated,

entry.title: moving to jorge
entry.summary: i stumbled on this article, code is run more than read from hackernews and from there, i went into the rabbit hole of reading other stuff from the author and found the whole blog to be nice and also that it's available to use, and i eventually decided that i'm gonna use this.
